sentence.Network_en: With Chinese paintings and calligraphic pieces, you can Beautify your life.
sentence.Network_cn: 家有中国书画, 美化你的生活.

sentence.Network_en: This is also something which is very special in Chinese calligraphic art!
sentence.Network_cn: 这亦是我们中国书法艺术的特色呢!

sentence.Network_en: Through the ages, great calligraphers developed representative calligraphic styles of their times.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国历代都有大书法家,其书法艺术和风格成为所在朝代书法的典型代表.

auth_sentence.content: Many of the valuable paintings and calligraphic works on show in Tokyo had never left China before.
